tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: He is great doctor with friendly talk,  he will spend time with patience to address the root cause of the problem,  he will never entertain unnecessary medication until it is must.  I strongly recommend this doctor n my kid is 16months now with minimum syrups most of the time we went out happily with small councilling n we followed those instructions n my baby recovered immediately. Very helpful doctor with great humanity

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: A very good pediatrician. He is very soft-spoken and caring towards our children.He gives us enough time to explain, Soft spoken, professional, understands and answers your each and every concern.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Pathetic  is not the word. Did not even check my kid using stethoscope. After 1 day checked with local doctor and came to know that kid was suffering from major issue with lungs.By god's grace kid is recovering.Had to pay Rs.700 for that  hospital called Rainbow.sad but truth.

I don't recommend this doctor even he is our pediatrician coz from past 1 nd half month we visited him like having on nd off fever face swelling dry cough 3 times we visited nd one video consultation but he said nothing is there he is fyn * ***** * ****** ** ***** ** **** *** *** *** *** ***** *** *** ******** ** **** ******* ** *** ******** ** ******* ******* ***** ********* ** ***** ** * I just don't recommend him plz don't go to him for treatment

review: Very good doctor for children. Doesn't prescribe unnecessary medicines. Good listener, calm and friendly.
